content: TE-CX SM Pointed chisels Self-sharpening SDS Plus (TE-C) pointed chisel bits for demolishing concrete and masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - ### FEATURES:Features Self-sharpening tip – work more efficiently and for longer with the same chisel, no resharpening or rehardening necessary (minimum penetration depth of 5 cm / 2 recommended) Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel High-alloy steel – for more reliable and consistent chisel quality Multiple lengths available – use shorter bits for best energy transmission and increased longevity, and longer ones for piercing deeper or reaching into tight spaces Certified quality – these chisels benefit from ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Demolishing concrete, brick or block Creating new openings at any position within the slab For use with SDS Plus (TE-C) electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 282298 - Pointed chisel TE-CX SM 18 - Package Size 1 pc - 282299 - Pointed chisel TE-CX SM 25 - Package Size 1 pc
